blog.name: lookclosernow
blog.title: We Live In A Beautiful World
blog.description: I'm twenty years old. Call it boredom.

body:
Love actually | Peter Parker

Note: I rewatched “Love actually” and it inspired me to write this. I hope you’ll like it. I want to mention @positiveparker and to thank her for helping me, she’s awesome. Please, leave feedback, it’s really important for me. Let me know if you want Part 2.

Plot: Reader is in love with Peter but he had no idea about (like in Love actually) it and had crush on Liz but what happens then?

Y/N always was Ned’s best friend until she met Peter Parker. He was a nice boy but she didn’t really have much conversation with him. Ned was the one who connected them and it was pretty weird for a young superhero. Peter had no idea, why you didn’t want to stay alone with him or talk to him, when Ned wasn’t around. So, he just gave up and decided not to bother you anymore. Nothing changed even when Y/N found out his secret, she didn’t ask questions like Ned or show that she was worried or interested. It seemed fine for their relationship not counting the fact she was madly in love with Peter Parker. She wondered how he could be so smart, kind, strong and charming at the same time! Y/N thought that he was too perfect for her but the problem was that he liked Liz and she couldn’t do anything about that.

“Look at them,” Ned smiled. “They are so cute together.”

“No, they’re not.” Y/N sighed rolling her eyes. “I don’t know, why he likes her so much.”

“And? I don’t know, why you don’t like him so much too. After all these years.”

“I…I never said that I don’t like him.” Ned paused before responding.

“Yes, you just behave like that.” Y/N didn’t know what to say because he was kinda right. All her actions screamed about it.

“But I still worry about him.”

“Really? Like how?”

“What if he tells her his secret? She’s obsessed with Spider-man, and he wants to impress her and then ‘Hello, Mr. Stark, this is my lovely girlfriend Liz, she wanted to meet you so much can you make her a suit too and bla-bla.’ Oh, it’s so stupid.”

“Are you jealous or something? Why does it bother you?”

“I’m not jealous!”

“Of course, but it still bothers you,” he chuckled. “Oh, shit, I forgot to tell you, he asked us out to the cinema and he’s bringing her.”

“What? What the hell!”

“Is it a problem?” He asked innocently.

“You know the answer, Ned! I don’t want to hang out with her!”

“Well, he does, I don’t think she’ll do anything stupid, she’s a nice girl, Y/N.” The boy shrugged.

“Fine.”

Y/N felt so uncomfortable watching them together, when Peter took Liz’s hand and laughed at her jokes those things hurt her more than she expected. There was nothing wrong with Liz at all, she was kind, beautiful and intelligent and that made the situation even worse. As usual Y/N was the one who took photos when they hung out. It didn’t mean she was a good photographer, it just meant she preferred taking pictures of other people rather than herself.

Now she finally was home alone and could relax after her long day. She sent all the photos and some videos on her computer but the thought of Liz and Peter didn’t leave her head. Did it mean that she would always spend time with them? Was it a date? But then all her thoughts were interrupted by someone.

“Hey, Y/N” Peter smiled shyly climbing through her window. “What’s up? I texted you, you didn’t answer.”

“Well, I was busy.” She replied being taken aback. “What do you want?”

“I wanted you to send me pictures, of when we were together!”

“Ok, is it so important, I mean, right now?”

“Well, I’m already here, I hope it’s not a problem.”

“Fine,” She sighed. “Send them to yourself, they are on my computer.”

“Ok, thank you,” He smiled again making her blush. “Hm, this one, and this, and…wait a second you recorded something too?”

“What? No!” She started to panic. He shouldn’t see it, but it was to late.

“Yes! It’s me and Ned,” he giggled. “Oh, and that’s me. You recorded really close don’t you!”

Y/N scrunched her eyes in frustration, it was so obvious that she recorded him admiring every smile, every chuckle that he gave her.

His eyes widened in sudden realisation. Did she? No, no way she liked him. When the video ended, there was a silence - one of those awful silences, when you know something’s wrong.

“But…” Peter started in shock. “You’ve never talked to me. You only talk to Ned.”

Y/N opened her mouth as if to say something before shutting it again avoiding his gaze.

“You don’t like me.” He stared at her waiting for answers, for explanations but there was nothing. What could she say? That she was in love with him the whole time but believed that she didn’t deserve him?

“I…I hoped to help you somehow with the photos but I need to go right now, it’s important. You can just show yourself out, can’t you? Thanks.” She mumbled trying not to cry. In a second Y/N left her room, she needed a fresh air right now to clear her head because, what happened was too much. But maybe it was possible to pretend like it was nothing, she hoped that she could.

His eyes widened in sudden realisation. Did she? No, no way she liked him. When the video ended, there was a silence - one of those awful silences, when you know something’s wrong.

“But…” Peter started in shock. “You’ve never talked to me. You only talk to Ned.”

Y/N opened her mouth as if to say something before shutting it again avoiding his gaze.

“You don’t like me.” He stared at her waiting for answers, for explanations but there was nothing. What could she say? That she was in love with him the whole time but believed that she didn’t deserve him?

captain marvel is coming

summary: My mom called Peter Parker self centered during infinity war when he was saving the Guardians because he said “I’m sorry I can’t...
body:
My mom called Peter Parker self centered during infinity war when he was saving the Guardians because he said “I’m sorry I can’t remember anyone names.”

Like her exact words were. “Figures. This generation is only concerned with themselves”

????????????????

WTF

blog.name: brandnewwings

summary:
MJ: what did you do last night?
Peter: absolutely nothing. I went to my own home and slept in my own bed with absolutely no...
body:
MJ: what did you do last night?

Peter: absolutely nothing. I went to my own home and slept in my own bed with absolutely no one

MJ:

MJ: you’re wearing Ned’s shirt backwards.

summary: TWO MEN AND A SPIDER WEB - SOCIETY OF VIRTUE  When you think about it, street criminals are much more scared of Spiderman than...
caption:
TWO MEN AND A SPIDER WEB - SOCIETY OF VIRTUE

When you think about it, street criminals are much more scared of Spiderman than Batman.

Batman just beats you up.

Spiderman beats you up, then binds you in webbing so you can’t move.

For hours.

Outside.

At night.

In whatever bad weather comes along.

And if you’re lucky, he didn’t gag you with his webbing so you can’t even scream for help.  God help you if you were a solo act criminal.  You’d have to endure this alone.

Criminals cry in relief when the cops come to cut them down.

summary:
Tony: Peter!
Quill & Parker: Yeah?
Tony: Not you Quill, MY Peter.
Parker: Your Peter?
Tony: No. No. Let's not turn this into a...
body:
Tony: Peter!

Quill & Parker: Yeah?

Tony: Not you Quill, MY Peter.

Parker: Your Peter?

Tony: No. No. Let’s not turn this into a thing.

reblog.comment:

Tony: Not you Quill, MY Peter.

Tony: No. No. Let’s not turn this into a thing.

Tony: No. No. Let’s not turn this into a thing.
